titleStmt.title: The state of the suite in Chancerie, betweene Francis Verslyn pl': agaynst Peter Manning, Michael Palmer and theire wiues &c. defendants is, viz
titleStmt.author: Verslyn, Francis.

notesStmt.note: Appeal to the House of Commons to dismiss a bill offered by the defendants, STC 17257.5. Chancery had decreed in Verslyn's favor in a dispute over inheritance--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
